channel.title: Berlin on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Berlin on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 3.6: Five Months
item.description: 8th April 2013 Hi! Yes, it’s been a long time. Nearly 5 months since I last wrote an update email. In November I went to Berlin for my UK visa, and spent whatever hours I was not at work or sleeping on writing a novel.

item.title: LOG 3.5: The extraction of Wisdom
item.description: 24th November, 2012 Hello everyone, It’s been a long time since I wrote and I’ve been meaning to but it’s only on this foggy November day that I’ve decided to get to it.
